thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Melrose CEO Says Believes GKN Shareholders Best Placed To Judge Which Management Team Is Better Equipped

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Melrose CEO Says Believes GKN Shareholders Best Placed To Judge Which Management Team Is Better Equipped
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Melrose Industries Plc:
* ‍STATEMENT REGARDING ITS OFFER FOR GKN PLC​ * “REAL PREMIUM FOR GKN SHAREHOLDERS IS REFLECTED IN CURRENT SHARE PRICES OF GKN, MELROSE, WHICH HAVE RISEN SUBSTANTIALLY SINCE ANNOUNCEMENT OF APPROACH BY GKN”​
* ‍“BELIEVES SHAREHOLDERS OF GKN BEST PLACED TO JUDGE WHICH MANAGEMENT TEAM IS BETTER EQUIPPED TO DELIVER GREATEST VALUE TO SHAREHOLDERS OF GKN”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
